main event: A civilian reported observing a light object resembling a setting sun, which moved rapidly to the southwest and left an orange, round shape that disappeared.
interesting points: The observation lasted for a few seconds.,The object appeared basketball-sized and bright orange.,The witness had not seen a similar object before.,The observer was about a mile away and a mile high during the sighting.,Local airfield reported many flights in the area at the time of the sighting.
sighted object: a light object resembling a setting sun
witness description: MRS. G O RANCH, age 58, reliability questionable, reported during an interview.
